message.content: In this part of the conversation, the team discusses the approach of using numbered topics and chapters for summarization. They consider the structure of the summaries and how they can be displayed on a website. They also mention the possibility of including a human-generated summary alongside the AI-generated one. They mention running tests with different prompts and formats to see which one works best. They agree that they will focus on the static website and then tweak the prompts and summaries as needed. They also discuss the possibility of having titles for each chapter in the summaries. Finally, they mention the advantage of this approach being more readable on a website and the potential ability to manually edit the summaries for better accuracy.
